content: A stove keeps me warm and a game of chess keeps me company: despite the heroic efforts of the bishop, white will lose tonight.
translations: ita:Una stufa mi scalda e una partita a scacchi mi tiene compagniaï¹• nonostante gli sforzi eroici del alfiere, il bianco stas
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
